item.description:
Learn about the Enneagram subtypes, sequence, relationship dynamics more in depth and how to develop the 9 types in yourself. We'll cover most of what's in Herb's new book, Enneagram Beyond the Basics!

 

Herb Pearce, Enneagram personality types expert, is the author of 3 books and a therapist who uses the Enneagram in his work with individuals, couples and families and with organizations.

www.herbpearce.com, 781 648 3737, herb@herbpearce.com

You can only register by a phone call. Please do not show up without calling me first. Anyone who signs up and doesn't show up or cancel in advance is automatically banned from membership!

Cost $50, $75 for Basic and Enneagram Beyond the Basics.
item.how_to_find_us: 2 blocks past Arlington Center next to Dunkin Donuts and near Walgreens
item.name: Enneagram Beyond the Basics - The Advanced Workshop
